title: RL31605
content: In their CCDF state plans, states vary in how they prioritize TANF families, transitioning families, and families at risk of welfare dependence for CCDF subsidy receipt. Some states give priority to these groups, but it is unclear how they rank against each other. Some states prioritize TANF families, transitioning families, and families at risk of welfare dependence for CCDF subsidy receipt, but it is unclear how these groups are ranked relative to each other. Some states did not provide specific information on how these groups are treated, indicated as "no information" in the table.
